.dfx-tabs__tabLink:first-child{margin-left:0}.dfx-tabs--pills>.dfx-tabs__links .dfx-tabs__tabLink:after{display:none}.dfx-tabs--pills>.dfx-tabs__links <script data-turbo-eval="false">
if (!Array.prototype.flat) {
Array.prototype.flat = function(depth) {
var flattend = [];
(function flat(array, depth) {
for (const el of array) {
if (Array.isArray(el) && depth > 0) {
flat(el, depth - 1);
} else {
flattend.push(el);
}
}
})(this, Math.floor(depth) || 1);
return flattend;
};
}
const isIntersectionObserverSupported  = 'IntersectionObserver' in window && 'IntersectionObserverEntry' in window && 'intersectionRatio' in window.IntersectionObserverEntry.prototype;
if (typeof requestIdleCallback === 'undefined' || !isIntersectionObserverSupported) {
console.log('polyfill');
const script = document.createElement('script');
script.src = 'https://a.c-dn.net/b/0xtyE4/polyfills.js';
document.currentScript.parentNode.insertBefore(script, document.currentScript.nextSibling);
}
</script>

<script>
!function(){function errMsg(errCode,msg){return(msg||"")+" (SystemJS Error#"+errCode+" https://git.io/JvFET#"+errCode+")"}var baseUrl,lastSepIndex,hasSymbol="undefined"!=typeof Symbol,hasSelf="undefined"!=typeof self,hasDocument="undefined"!=typeof document,envGlobal=hasSelf?self:global;!hasDocument||(lastSepIndex=document.querySelector("base[href]"))&&(baseUrl=lastSepIndex.href),baseUrl||"undefined"==typeof location||-1!==(lastSepIndex=(baseUrl=location.href.split("#")[0].split("?")[0]).lastIndexOf("/"))&&(baseUrl=baseUrl.slice(0,lastSepIndex+1));var backslashRegEx=/\\/g;function resolveIfNotPlainOrUrl(relUrl,parentUrl){if("/"===(relUrl=-1!==relUrl.indexOf("\\")?relUrl.replace(backslashRegEx,"/"):relUrl)[0]&&"/"===relUrl[1])return parentUrl.slice(0,parentUrl.indexOf(":")+1)+relUrl;if("."===relUrl[0]&&("/"===relUrl[1]||"."===relUrl[1]&&("/"===relUrl[2]||2===relUrl.length&&(relUrl+="/"))||1===relUrl.length&&(relUrl+="/"))||"/"===relUrl[0]){var parentProtocol=parentUrl.slice(0,parentUrl.indexOf(":")+1),pathname="/"===parentUrl[parentProtocol.length+1]?"file:"!==parentProtocol?(pathname=parentUrl.slice(parentProtocol.length+2)).slice(pathname.indexOf("/")+1):parentUrl.slice(8):parentUrl.slice(parentProtocol.length+("/"===parentUrl[parentProtocol.length]));if("/"===relUrl[0])return parentUrl.slice(0,parentUrl.length-pathname.length-1)+relUrl;for(var segmented=pathname.slice(0,pathname.lastIndexOf("/")+1)+relUrl,output=[],segmentIndex=-1,i=0;i<segmented.length;i++)-1!==segmentIndex?"/"===segmented[i]&&(output.push(segmented.slice(segmentIndex,i+1)),segmentIndex=-1):"."===segmented[i]?"."!==segmented[i+1]||"/"!==segmented[i+2]&&i+2!==segmented.length?"/"===segmented[i+1]||i+1===segmented.length?i+=1:segmentIndex=i:(output.pop(),i+=2):segmentIndex=i;return-1!==segmentIndex&&output.push(segmented.slice(segmentIndex)),parentUrl.slice(0,parentUrl.length-pathname.length)+output.join("")}}function resolveUrl(relUrl,parentUrl){return resolveIfNotPlainOrUrl(relUrl,parentUrl)||(-1!==relUrl.indexOf(":")?relUrl:resolveIfNotPlainOrUrl("./"+relUrl,parentUrl))}function resolveAndComposePackages(packages,outPackages,baseUrl,parentMap,parentUrl){for(var p in packages){var mapped,resolvedLhs=resolveIfNotPlainOrUrl(p,baseUrl)||p,rhs=packages[p];"string"==typeof rhs&&((mapped=resolveImportMap(parentMap,resolveIfNotPlainOrUrl(rhs,baseUrl)||rhs,parentUrl))?outPackages[resolvedLhs]=mapped:targetWarning("W1",p,rhs,"bare specifier did not resolve"))}}function getMatch(path,matchObj){if(matchObj[path])return path;var sepIndex=path.length;do{var segment=path.slice(0,sepIndex+1);if(segment in matchObj)return segment}while(-1!==(sepIndex=path.lastIndexOf("/",sepIndex-1)))}function applyPackages(id,pkg){var pkgName=getMatch(id,pkg);if(pkgName){pkg=pkg[pkgName];if(null!==pkg)return id.length>pkgName.length&&"/"!==pkg[pkg.length-1]?void targetWarning("W2",pkgName,pkg,"should have a trailing '/'"):pkg+id.slice(pkgName.length)}}function targetWarning(code,match,target,msg){console.warn(errMsg(code,"Package target "+msg+", resolving target '"+target+"' for "+match))}function resolveImportMap(importMap,resolvedOrPlain,parentUrl){for(var scopes=importMap.scopes,scopeUrl=parentUrl&&getMatch(parentUrl,scopes);scopeUrl;){var packageResolution=applyPackages(resolvedOrPlain,scopes[scopeUrl]);if(packageResolution)return packageResolution;scopeUrl=getMatch(scopeUrl.slice(0,scopeUrl.lastIndexOf("/")),scopes)}return applyPackages(resolvedOrPlain,importMap.imports)||-1!==resolvedOrPlain.indexOf(":")&&resolvedOrPlain}var toStringTag=hasSymbol&&Symbol.toStringTag,REGISTRY=hasSymbol?Symbol():"@";function fetchOptions(){var 0===_a?void 0:_a.href}}get defaultHeaders(){return{Accept:"text/html, application/xhtml+xml"}}get isIdempotent(){return this.method==FetchMethod.get}get abortSignal(){return .turbo-progress-bar {

Visit{constructor(snapshotHTML,response,visitCachedSnapshot,willRender={}){this.identifier=uuid(),this.timingMetrics={},this.followedRedirect=!1,this.historyChanged=!1,this.scrolled=!1,this.snapshotCached=!1,this.state=VisitState.initialized,this.delegate=snapshotHTML,this.location=response,this.restorationIdentifier=visitCachedSnapshot||uuid();var{action,historyChanged,referrer,snapshotHTML,response,visitCachedSnapshot,willRender}=Object.assign(Object.assign({},defaultOptions),willRender);this.action=action,this.historyChanged=historyChanged,this.referrer=referrer,this.snapshotHTML=snapshotHTML,this.response=response,this.isSamePage=this.delegate.locationWithActionIsSamePage(this.location,this.action),this.visitCachedSnapshot=visitCachedSnapshot,this.willRender=willRender,this.scrolled=!willRender}get adapter(){return this.delegate.adapter}get view(){return this.delegate.view}get history(){return this.delegate.history}get restorationData(){return this.isSamePage}start(){this.state==VisitState.initialized&&(this.recordTimingMetric(TimingMetric.visitStart),this.state=VisitState.started,this.adapter.visitStarted(this),this.delegate.visitStarted(this))}cancel(){this.state==VisitState.started&&(this.request&&this.request.cancel(),this.cancelRender(),this.state=VisitState.canceled)}complete(){this.state==VisitState.started&&(this.recordTimingMetric(TimingMetric.visitEnd),this.state=VisitState.completed,this.adapter.visitCompleted(this),this.delegate.visitCompleted(this),this.followRedirect())}fail(){this.state==VisitState.started&&(this.state=VisitState.failed,this.adapter.visitFailed(this))}changeHistory(){var this.view.renderPromise),isSuccessful(statusCode)&&null!=responseHTML?(yield <script>

<h1 class="jsdfx-cookiesPageTabsTarget my-2 my-xl-4">Cookies</h1>
<div>
<div class="dfx-tabs jsdfx-cookies__tabs my-3 dfx-tabs--responsive dfx-tabs--showArrow ">
<div class="dfx-tabs__links dfx-border dfx-border--b-1">
<button class="dfx-tabs__tabLink py-2">
<svg role="img" class=" jsdfx-iconCritical  mr-2 dfx-tabs__icon d-md-none">

</svg>
<span class="dfx-tabs__tabText text-center d-block">
Cookies on our site
</span>
</button>
<button class="dfx-tabs__tabLink py-2">

</svg>

Optimal cookies
</span>
</button>
</div>
<div class="dfx-tabsToolbar">
<div class="dfx-tabsToolbar__header py-2 d-none d-md-none">
<div class="dfx-tabsToolbar__content font-weight-bold">Select</div>
<div class="dfx-tabsToolbar__arrow ml-auto dfx-tabsToolbar__buttonIcon">
</div>

<div class="dfx-tabs__linksToolbar">
<div class="dfx-tabs__linksToolbarContent">
</div>
</div>
<div class="dfx-tabs__content">
<div class="mt-4">
<h5 class="mt-2">What are cookies?</h5>
<p>Cookies are small pieces of text stored on your computer when you visit almost any website.</p><p>Companies use them to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Verify your identity, to ensure your security and privacy</li><li>Determine the browser and settings you are using, to provide optimised content</li><li>Understand the way you navigate through websites, so firms can make improvements</li><li>Help site owners and third-party advertisers tailor content to your preferences</li>
</ul>
<p>DailyFX uses &quot;Google Analytics&quot; and &quot;Adobe Analytics&quot; to collect and analyze information about how the DailyFX website is used. Depending on your location, DailyFX may use third party technology providers such as Google and Adobe to place a cookie on your device in order for Daily FX, and DailyFX&#039;s affiliate companies, to display content and advertisements which may be of interest to you while visiting the Daily FX website and across the internet after leaving the DailyFX site. Cookies do not contain personal identification information. You may disable the use of cookies by updating your ad settings through your web browser.</p>
<h5 class="mt-6 mb-3">Our policy</h5>
<p>We respect your privacy and are committed to providing you with the information and tools you need to manage your cookies.</p><p>This site provides three different levels of cookies:</p><p><strong>Essential cookies</strong></p><p>This is the minimum requirement to ensure that our website is secure, performs as expected, and displays information in the correct format. Without these cookies, we’re unable to provide this website to you.</p><p><strong>Moderate cookies</strong></p><p>This level includes essential cookies, plus those used for tracking the performance of the website and counting in-bound traffic from marketing campaigns. They enable us to improve segmentation and personalise your user journey.</p><p><strong>Optimal cookies</strong></p><p>This level includes essential and moderate cookies, plus those used for analysing the way you use our website. They enable us to serve you relevant product ads on social media and advertising networks.</p>
You can find out more about each cookie type and edit your settings <a href="#" data-choosen-tab="1" class="jsdfx-tabs__activatingLink">here</a>.
<h5 class="mt-6 mb-3">Cookie management</h5>
<p>You can manage cookies by changing the settings in the web browser on your computer or tablet. To manage cookies on your mobile phone, you may need to refer to your handset manual.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt-4">
<p>Some cookies are essential to the function of this site. Some help us improve the way our website works, and others help third-party partners provide you with ads that reflect your interests.</p><p>You’ll receive our optimal cookie setting by default, as it enables us to give you the best possible browsing experience and provide content that is relevant, targeted and personalised to you.</p><p>If you’d like to edit your cookie settings, you can do so below.</p>
<label class="dfx-cookiesLevel__label py-3 m-0 d-flex">
<input type="checkbox" class="dfx-checkbox jsdfx-cookiesLevel__input" value="3">
<span class="dfx-checkbox-element mr-2">
<span class="dfx-checkbox-tick">
<svg role="img" class=" jsdfx-iconCritical  ">
<use xlink:href="/butler/images/svg/svg-symbols.svg#check"></use>
</svg>
</span>
</span>
<span class="d-block">
<span class="font-weight-bold dfx-cookiesLevel__label--desc jsdfx-cookiesLevel__template--title">Optimal (Recommended)</span>
<span class="dfx-cookiesLevel__label--desc jsdfx-cookiesLevel__template--description d-inline-block">Includes essential and moderate cookies, plus those used for analysing the way you use our website. Enables us to serve you relevant product ads on social media and advertising networks.</span>
</span>
</label>
<label class="dfx-cookiesLevel__label py-3 m-0 d-flex">
<input type="checkbox" class="dfx-checkbox jsdfx-cookiesLevel__input" value="2">
<span class="dfx-checkbox-element mr-2">
<span class="dfx-checkbox-tick">
<svg role="img" class=" jsdfx-iconCritical  ">
<use xlink:href="/butler/images/svg/svg-symbols.svg#check"></use>
</svg>
</span>
</span>
<span class="d-block">
<span class="font-weight-bold dfx-cookiesLevel__label--desc jsdfx-cookiesLevel__template--title">Moderate</span>
<span class="dfx-cookiesLevel__label--desc jsdfx-cookiesLevel__template--description d-inline-block">Includes essential cookies, plus those used for tracking the performance of the website and counting in-bound traffic from marketing campaigns. Enables us to improve segmentation and personalise your user journey.</span>
</span>
</label>
<label class="dfx-cookiesLevel__label py-3 m-0 mb-2 d-flex">
<input type="checkbox" class="dfx-checkbox" value="1" checked="checked" disabled="disabled">
<span class="dfx-checkbox-element mr-2">
<span class="dfx-checkbox-tick">
<svg role="img" class=" jsdfx-iconCritical  ">
<use xlink:href="/butler/images/svg/svg-symbols.svg#check"></use>
</svg>
</span>
</span>
<span class="d-block">
<span class="font-weight-bold dfx-cookiesLevel__label--desc">Essential</span>
<span class="dfx-cookiesLevel__label--desc d-inline-block">These are the minimum required to ensure that our website is secure, performs as expected, and displays information in the correct format.</span>
</span>
</label>
<button class="jsdfx-cookies__updateSubmit mb-6 mr-3 pr-6 dfx-buttonRipple dfx-btn dfx-btn--primary dfx-btn--arrow font-weight-bold dfx-font-size-3">
Update                    </button>
<p class="jsdfx-cookiesLevel__feedbackMessage dfx-cookiesLevel__feedbackMessage m-0 pb-2">Updated Successfully</p>
<p><strong>Important information</strong></p><p>If you disable one or more cookie categories, we'll stop using that type of cookie to gather any further information. However, we may still use information collected from existing cookies on your device. If you want to delete existing cookies from your browser, you’ll need to do so manually from your device. Find out how to do this at <a href="https://www.aboutcookies.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://www.aboutcookies.org/</a>.</p>
<h5 class="mt-6 mb-3">Cookie management</h5>
<p>You can manage cookies by changing the settings in the web browser on your computer or tablet. To manage cookies on your mobile phone, you may need to refer to your handset manual.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt-4">
<h5 class="mt-2">Essential cookies</h5>
<p>These are the minimum required to ensure that our website is secure, performs as expected, and displays information in the correct format.</p>
<p>You cannot deactivate these cookies, as without them we are unable to provide this website to you.</p>
<p><strong>Examples</strong></p>
<table class="dfx-table">
<tr>
<th>Name</th>
<th>Type of cookie</th>
<th>Source of cookie</th>
<th>Function</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>redirectData</td>
<td>DFX functional</td>
<td>DailyFX</td>
<td>Enables us to show you the correct website for your location</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>mobile_device</td>
<td>DFX functional</td>
<td>DailyFX</td>
<td>Detects what device you’re using, so our website displays in the correct format</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>DFXL</td>
<td>DFX functional</td>
<td>DailyFX</td>
<td>Allow access to premium content</td>
</tr>
</table>
<p>You can review and edit your cookie settings <a href="#" data-choosen-tab="1" class="jsdfx-tabs__activatingLink">here</a>.</p>
<h5 class="mt-6 mb-3">Cookie management</h5>
<p>You can manage cookies by changing the settings in the web browser on your computer or tablet. To manage cookies on your mobile phone, you may need to refer to your handset manual.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt-4">
<p>This level includes essential cookies, plus those used for tracking the performance of the website and counting in-bound traffic from marketing campaigns. They help us understand the way you travel to and through our website, so we can improve segmentation and make it easier for you to find the information you need.</p>
<p><strong>Examples</strong></p>
<table class="dfx-table">
<tr>
<th>Name</th>

<th>Function</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>_ga</td>
<td>DFX functional</td>
<td>DailyFX</td>

</tr>
<tr>
<td>s_vi</td>
<td>DFX functional</td>

</tr>

</tr>

<p>You can review and edit your cookie settings <a href="#" data-choosen-tab="1" class="jsdfx-tabs__activatingLink">here</a>.</p>
<h5 class="mt-6 mb-3">Cookie management</h5>
<p>You can manage cookies by changing the settings in the web browser on your computer or tablet. To manage cookies on your mobile phone, you may need to refer to your handset manual.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt-4">
<p>This is our recommended setting, as it includes all essential and moderate cookies plus those used for analysing the way you use our website. These cookies help ensure that ads you see across social media and advertising networks are relevant to you and your interests.</p>
<p><strong>Examples</strong></p>

Microsoft Edge
</span>
</button>
<button class="dfx-tabs__tabLink py-2">
<svg role="img" class=" jsdfx-iconCritical  mr-2 dfx-tabs__icon d-md-none">

<div class="dfx-tabsToolbar">
<div class="dfx-tabsToolbar__header py-2 d-none d-md-none">
<div class="dfx-tabsToolbar__content font-weight-bold">Select</div>
<div class="dfx-tabsToolbar__arrow ml-auto dfx-tabsToolbar__buttonIcon">
</div>

<div class="dfx-tabs__linksToolbar">
<div class="dfx-tabs__linksToolbarContent">
</div>
</div>
<div class="dfx-tabs__content">
<div class="mt-3">
<h5 class="mt-3 mb-3">Google Chrome</h5>
<ul>
<li>Click the 'burger' icon in the browser's toolbar</li>
<li>Select 'Settings'</li>
<li>Click 'Show advanced settings'</li>
<li>Choose 'Privacy' and then 'Content settings'</li>
<li>To enable cookies, in the 'Cookies' section, tick 'Allow local data to be set (recommended)'. This option enables both first and third-party cookies</li>
<li>To allow only first-party cookies, enable 'Block all third-party cookies without exception'</li>
<li>To disable cookies, select 'Block sites from setting any data'</li>
</ul>
<p>There are multiple levels of cookie enablement in Google Chrome. For more information, <a href="https://support.google.com/chrome/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=95647" target="_blank">click here</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt-3">
<h5 class="mt-3 mb-3">Microsoft Internet Explorer</h5>
<p>Versions 9-11</p>
<ul>
<li>Select 'Tools' from the top of your browser's window</li>
<li>Choose 'Internet Options'</li>
<li>Navigate to the 'Privacy' tab</li>
<li>Click 'Advanced'. Here you can choose to 'Accept' 'Block' or 'Prompt' both first and third-party cookies</li>
<li>To disable cookies, tick 'Block'</li>
</ul>
<p>There are multiple levels of cookie enablement in Microsoft Internet Explorer. For more information, <a href="https://windows.microsoft.com/en-GB/windows-vista/Block-or-allow-cookies" target="_blank">click here</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt-3">
<h5 class="mt-3 mb-3">Microsoft Edge</h5>
<ul>
<li>Click the menu button</li>
<li>Choose 'Settings' and then 'View advanced settings'</li>
<li>Under 'Cookies' choose either 'Don't block cookies' or 'Block only third party cookies'</li>
<li>To disable cookies, click on 'Block all cookies'</li>
</ul>
<p>There are multiple levels of cookie enablement in Microsoft Edge. For more information, <a href="https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-gb/privacystatement" target="_blank">click here</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt-3">
<h5 class="mt-3 mb-3">Mozilla Firefox</h5>
<ul>
<li>Click on the 'burger' button at the top of the browser (or 'Tools' if using Windows XP)</li>
<li>Select 'Options'</li>
<li>Click 'Privacy'</li>
<li>Set 'Firefox will' to 'Use custom settings for history'</li>
<li>Select 'Accept cookies from sites' and your prefered treatment of third-party cookies</li>
<li>To disable cookies, remove the check mark from 'Accept cookies from sites'</li>
<li>Click 'OK' to close the window</li>
</ul>
<p>There are multiple levels of cookie enablement in Mozilla Firefox. For more information, <a href="https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/Enabling%20and%20disabling%20cookies" target="_blank">click here</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt-3">
<h5 class="mt-3 mb-3">Opera</h5>
<ul>
<li>In the browser's menu, select 'Settings'</li>
<li>Under cookies, tick 'Allow local data to be set (recommended)'</li>
<li>To disable cookies, select 'Block sites from setting any data'</li>
<li>To stop only third-party cookies, select 'Block third-party cookies and site data'</li>
</ul>
<p>There are multiple levels of cookie enablement in Opera. For more information, <a href="https://help.opera.com/en/latest/web-preferences/#cookies" target="_blank">click here</a>.</p>
</div>
<div class="mt-3">
<h5 class="mt-3 mb-3">Safari</h5>
<ul>
<li>In the menu bar, select 'Safari', then choose 'Preferences'</li>
<li>Click on 'Privacy'</li>
<li>Under 'Cookies and website data:', select 'Allow from the websites I visit'</li>
<li>To disable cookies, select 'Always block'</li>
</ul>
<p>There are multiple levels of cookie enablement in Safari. For more information, <a href="https://support.apple.com/en-gb/guide/safari/sfri11471/mac" target="_blank">click here</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="footer" class="dfx-footer pt-4 w-100 dfx-font-size-3" data-swiftype-index="false" data-turbo-permanent>

<p class="dfx-footer__disclaimer mb-0 w-100">
<span class="dfx-footer__disclaimerItem d-block d-lg-inline"><b>Leveraged trading in foreign currency or off-exchange products on margin carries significant risk and may not be suitable for all investors. We advise you to carefully consider whether trading is appropriate for you based on your personal circumstances. Forex trading involves risk. Losses can exceed deposits.</b> We recommend that you seek independent advice and ensure you fully understand the risks involved before trading.<br><br></span>

HOWEVER, YOU SHOULD BE AWARE THAT NFA DOES NOT HAVE REGULATORY OVERSIGHT AUTHORITY OVER UNDERLYING OR SPOT VIRTUAL CURRENCY PRODUCTS OR TRANSACTIONS OR VIRTUAL CURRENCY EXCHANGES, CUSTODIANS OR MARKETS.<br><br></span><span class="dfx-footer__disclaimerItem d-block d-lg-inline">FX Publications Inc (dba DailyFX) is registered with the Commodities Futures Trading Commission as a Guaranteed Introducing Broker and is a member of the National Futures Association (ID# 0517400). Registered Address: 19 North Sangamon Street, Chicago, IL 60607. window.runStacked = function() {
const container = new DfxGaBackendContainer();
const ga = DfxGaFactory.create();
ga.registerBackendContainer(container);
container
.setReportPath("Cookies")
.setPageType("Cookies")
.setPageCategory("Disclosures")
.setPageTags([])
let pageViewEvent = DfxGaPageViewEventFactory.create();
pageViewEvent = (function(event) {return event})(pageViewEvent);
ga.sendEvent(pageViewEvent);
DfxDomEventsFactory.create();
const allowedTrackingsConfig = {
pixel : true,
GPT : true,
GTM : true,
adobe_tracking : true,
taboola_pixel : true,
baidu : false,
twitter_pixel : false
}
const dfxThirdPartyManager = DfxThirdPartyManagerFactory.create(allowedTrackingsConfig);
dfxThirdPartyManager.createFacebookPixel();
dfxThirdPartyManager.createTwitterPixel();
dfxThirdPartyManager.facebookPixelTrackPageView();
dfxThirdPartyManager.createGPT();
dfxThirdPartyManager.createGTM();
dfxThirdPartyManager.trackGTMpageLoadEvent();
dfxThirdPartyManager.createAdobeTracking('adobe-tracking-system.js');
dfxThirdPartyManager.createTaboolaPixel();
dfxThirdPartyManager.createBaiduTracking();
DfxConfigFactory
.create()
.set('economicCalendarCountriesConfig', JSON.parse('[{"group":"americas","country":"United
